i1.name: Prophet of an Elder God
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Illaoi''' spawns a {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} on a nearby impassable terrain if no other Tentacles are nearby. Tentacles fully spawn after a 2 second delay and are {{tip|untargetable}} in the meantime.

{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} deal {{pp|10 to 180}} {{as|(+ 120% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{tip|Physical Damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies struck when commanded to attack by her abilities. Each {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} also {{tip|heal|heals}} '''Illaoi''' for {{as|5% '''missing''' health}} if it hits at least one enemy {{tip|champion}}. ''See [[#Pets|Pet Details]] for more details.''
i1.notes:
* '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' do not spawn in the [[Nexus Obelisk|Nexus Obelisk's]] attack range and on ally invulnerable {{tip|turrets|structures}}.
* Impassable terrain also includes player-made terrain and terrain that is passable by a team but not by the other, for example base gates.
* The '''''{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}''''' will continue its spawn animation and be able to start an attack, after the animation ends, even if '''Illaoi''' or a '''''{{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}''''' are not nearby.
* If '''Illaoi''' uses ''{{ai|Harsh Lesson}}'' during '''''{{as|Tentacles'|buzzword2}}''''' spawn animation, they won't attack but the SFX of the attack will still be heard.
** If this happens, after the '''''{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}''''' finishes its spawn animation, it will be unable to start an attack for its remaining attack SFX.

q1.name: Tentacle Smash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Illaoi''' slams her idol into the ground, summoning a {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} that slams down in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} before disappearing.
q1.notes:
* Getting {{tip|airborne|displaced}} during the cast time will not change the indicator on the ground, but it will change the damaged area, while still being directed towards the previous pointed location. 
* If '''Illaoi''' is not {{tip|sight|visible}}, the slam will be seen but it will not be heard.

w1.name: Harsh Lesson
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Illaoi's''' next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds gains {{sti|range|225 '''bonus''' range}} and causes her to {{tip|dash|leap}} to her target if they're beyond her normal basic attack range.

The attack deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, with a minimum threshold, and capped at 300 against non-champions, and commands all {{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} in range to attack her target. The minimum bonus damage can also be applied against {{tip|turrets}}.
w1.notes:
* Since the attack applies both on-hit effects and spell effects it will trigger {{ii|Muramana}} twice.
* The '''bonus''' damage doesn't apply lifesteal healing but it does apply {{sti|spell vamp}}.
* ''Harsh Lesson'' is made of two different abilities which are decided by '''Illaoi's''' range to the target, being either melee or within dash range.
* The close range ability:
** Is {{tip|unstoppable}}, meaning no effect can interrupt it other than death - either '''Illaoi's''' or the target's. Using {{si|Flash}} or going into {{tip|stasis}} (i.e {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}, {{ii|Guardian Angel}}) will cancel the animation but the attack will still land.
** Can be used while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}. If '''Illaoi''' attack commands and then casts ''Harsh Lesson'', she will use the close range ''Harsh Lesson'' even if the target is beyond her melee range.
** Starting the attack before triggering {{iis|Guardian Angel}} passive and hitting while she's in it will not cause the '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' to slam.
** Starting the attack before the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} will still cause the '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' to slam the target.
** Does trigger {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.
** Triggers {{ii|Kircheis Shard|Energized}} effects [[on-hit]].
** Using it at the same time with {{ii|Ravenous Hydra}} will perform an unusual dunk.
** If the empowered attack duration ends during the attack animation, the attack won't be empowered.
* The dash range ability:
** Is not unstoppable, meaning that effects can interrupt it during the dash and put it cooldown. {{si|Flash}} and {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}} cannot be used during the dash.
** Cannot be used while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}.
** Starting the attack before the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} will not make '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' slam.
** Does not trigger {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.
** Triggers {{ii|Kircheis Shard|Energized}} effects on-jump.
** Having enough attack speed will perform an unusual dunk.
** Having increased size will increase the range of her ''Harsh Lesson'' but the indicator range will not change.
** If the empowered attack duration ends during the dash, the buff will linger until the attack has finished.
* {{tip|spell shield|Spell shields}} will block the '''bonus''' damage but will not prevent the '''{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}''' slam, unless a dash range ''Harsh Lesson'' has been used, in which case the '''bonus''' damage is not blocked by the ''spell shield'' is still consumed.
* Parries ({{ai|Counter Strike|Jax}}, {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen}}, {{ai|Blinding Dart|Teemo}}) will block the damage and will not trigger {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} slams, with the exception of:
** {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen}} when using a close range ''Harsh Lesson'', which triggers {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} slams.
** {{ai|Blinding Dart|Teemo}} when using a dash range ''Harsh Lesson'', which both deals damage and triggers {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} slams.
* If the target dies at the moment ''Harsh Lesson'' hits the target, it will be consumed and put on cooldown, without making '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' slam.
* The '''''{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}''''' attacking because of ''Harsh Lesson'' is considered to be part of it, and thus will not grant additional stacks of {{ri|Conqueror}}, {{ri|Electrocute}}, {{ri|Phase Rush}} and [[Named item effect#|Tribute]].
* Using it together with {{ii|Dead Man's Plate}} will grant an additional stack of {{ri|Conqueror}}.
* ''Harsh Lesson's'' '''bonus''' damage applies before {{iis|Blade of the Ruined King}} damage.
* ''Harsh Lesson'' triggers {{ri|Bone Plating}} and one of its plates with the same attack.
* Attack moving while charging {{si|Hexflash}} will delay the attack.

e1.name: Test of Spirit
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Illaoi''' fires a projectile in the target direction, stopping at the first enemy hit. If the enemy is a {{tip|champion}}, their {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is pulled in front of '''Illaoi''' over {{fd|0.75}} seconds. The target is tethered to the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} for {{tt|7 seconds|Timer starts when the spirit is being pulled}}, and is {{tip|true sight|revealed}} while the tether remains.

The {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} has the target's {{sti|health|{{as|'''current''' health}}}}, {{sti|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|magic resist}}}}, and redirects a portion of the {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} received to the tethered champion.

When the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is killed or the target moves too far away, the tether is severed, marking the target as a ''Vessel'' for 10 seconds, {{tip|sight|revealing}} the area around them for a few seconds, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 80% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds once the tether returns back to them.
Each {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} autonomously attacks the closest ''Vessel'' or {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} once every {{pp|3|5.5 to 3.5|1 to 13|formula=5.5-1 every 6 lvls. Cooldown starts upon starting the slam}} seconds.

{{sbc|Vessel:}} Enemies made a ''Vessel'' spawn a {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} near themselves every {{pp|3|5 to 3|1 to 13}} seconds, They can rid themselves of the the debuff by {{tip|takedown|taking down}} '''Illaoi'''. {{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} can spawn exceptionally closer to each other than when spawned by '''Illaoi'''.
e1.notes:
* {{as|Spirits|buzzword}} are classified as ''[[Champion summoned units#Decoy|Decoys]]''.
** {{as|Spirits|buzzword}} can only be targeted by '''Illaoi's''' team and neutral monsters. The {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} allies cannot target it.
** {{as|Spirits|buzzword}} take 50% damage from [[turret]]s and do not cause turrets to {{ii|Ohmwrecker (Turret Item)|Warm Up}} their attacks.
** {{as|Spirits|buzzword}} cannot be {{tip|heal|healed}} or {{tip|shield|shielded}} ({{ri|Summon Aery}} excluded).
** The {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} levels up when the {{as|Vessel|buzzword2}} does. Doing so will increase the {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} {{as|health}}, {{as|armor}}, and {{as|magic resist}}, and additionally extend its lifetime by 1 second.
** Killing the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} awards {{g|25}} and {{as|{{sti|Experience|44}}}}.
* Redirected damage is calculated by taking the premitigation damage, applying ''Test of Spirit's'' damage modifier, and then capping it to the {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} {{as|'''current''' health}}. This damage will then be affected by damage modifiers (resistances and other effects) of the {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}.
** If the {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} damage modifier is lower than ''Test of Spirit's'', it will cause a reduction in total redirected damage, else it will cause an increase.
** If the {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} damage modifier is lower than the {{as|Vessel's|buzzword3}}, it will cause an increase in total redirected damage, else it will cause a decrease.
** '''Illaoi''' needs {{as|{{ap|(100-(25 to 45))/8*100}} '''total''' AD}} to reach 100% redirected damage. As per above, the damage is still dependent on the {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} and {{as|Vessel's|buzzword3}} damage modifiers and may not always be able to deal 100% of the target's '''current''' health as total redirected damage.
** The damage displayed as being received by the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is not representative of the damage redirected to the {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}, as the combat text shown adjacent to the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} uses the {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} resistances.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} may only prevent the initial spirit grab and the ''slow'' upon becoming a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}. ''Spell shields'' will not prevent becoming a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} or {{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} from attacking.
* The spirit pull is not considered a {{tip|crowd control}} effect and will not be blocked by cc-immune effects, with the exception of {{cai|E|Morgana}}.
* If the target becomes a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} within range of a dormant {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}, that {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} will skip its first attack.
* The tentacle model of the first cast is connected to '''Illaoi's''' body and will stop moving when '''Illaoi''' does (e.g {{tip|stasis}}, {{tip|sleep}}, {{tip|airborne}}). However, the projectile will not, and will be able to hit enemies away from its model position. It will also not be seen by enemies if '''Illaoi''' is not {{tip|Sight|visible}}, but it will be heard if the tentacle passes through their vision. 
* Using {{si|Flash}} during the cast time will change '''Illaoi's''' position but the tentacle will still be directed towards the previous pointed location.
* Grabbing the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} of a champion that has their resource bar white (i.e {{tip|Flow}}) will make the {{as|Spirit's|buzzword}} lifetime (the white bar below the lifebar) disappear.
* Grabbing the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} of a target that is {{tip|camouflage|camouflaged}} while thereâ€™s a control ward revealing them will make the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} invisible.
* Only '''Illaoi''' can see who's been {{as|Vesseled|buzzword3}}, with their model covered in watery effects. The {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} itself will instead have its screen covered in watery effects.
* If the enemy champion is reviving when the conditions for becoming a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} are met, then they will not revive as a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}.
* Runes consider the {{as|Spirit|Buzzword}} as a champion for their effects and stat-tracking.
** {{ri|Predator}} only reflects double bonus damage, not taking into account actual damage done to the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} (e.g if {{ri|Predator}} would deal 60 bonus damage, what would get reflected is 120 damage).
* Transferred damage will apply on-damage effects, such as {{ii|The Black Cleaver}}, {{ii|Morellonomicon}}, {{ii|Executioner's Calling}}, {{bi|Aspect of the Dragon}} burn damage and the healing from {{ii|Death's Dance}} or {{ii|Hextech Gunblade}}.
** Transferred damage will not doubly apply on-hit or on-spell effects versus the target (e.g. {{ii|Liandry's Torment}}, {{ri|Phase Rush}} stacks). These effects are only applied versus the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}}.
** Attacking the {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} and its {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} simultaneously will only apply one {{ii|The Black Cleaver}} to the {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}}.
* Once the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} vanishes, whether defeated or not, '''Illaoi''' will get {{iis|Phage|Rage}} full movement speed bonus and 1 creep score in-game (not included in the post-game counter).
* The {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is immune to {{tip|stasis}} (i.e. {{cai|Tempered Fate|Bard}}).
* {{cai|Riposte|Fiora}} can be used to prevent becoming a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} if used before the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is killed or while leaving the tether's range.
* {{cis|Sion}} {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} cannot be spawned during {{ai|Glory in Death|Sion}}. {{as|Spirits|buzzword}} created before ''Sion's'' undeath will remain active.

r1.name: Leap of Faith
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Illaoi''' leaps into the air {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} before slamming her idol into the ground, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies. For each enemy champion hit, a {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} is summoned for 8 seconds (up to a maximum of 6 summons).

For the duration, {{ais|Harsh Lesson|Illaoi}} {{sti|cooldown}} is halved, all {{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} awakened by '''Illaoi''' are {{tip|untargetable}}, will not show their hitboxes, nor go dormant, and will take half the amount of time to make an attack.
r1.notes:
* {{si|Flash}} can be used during the cast time.
** This means '''Illaoi''' slams at the new location.
* [[Decoy]]s also count as champions for the '''''{{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}}''''' summoning.
* '''Illaoi''' spawns the '''''{{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}}''''' 725 range away from her, unless there's a natural wall blocking the way making the '''''{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}''''' spawn on it, based on:
** The direction she's facing.
*** She will always face at the nearest {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champion, in ''Leap of Faith's'' range, the instant she leaps.
*** If there's no enemy champion nearby, she faces in the direction of the cursor.
*** {{si|Flash|Flashing}} mid-animation will change the spawning direction to where the cursor is pointed, regardless of the nearest enemy champion.
** How many champions she hits.
*** 1+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 0 degrees.
*** 2+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 60 degrees.
*** 3+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 300 degrees.
*** 4+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 120 degrees.
*** 5+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 240 degrees.
*** 6+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 180 degrees.
** If there're no walls nearby, spawning the last {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God||{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} will form a perfect hexagon.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block the ability's damage but will not prevent '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' from spawning.
* Activating {{ii|Guardian Angel}} during the leap will not stop the ability from doing damage or spawn '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}'''''.
* Using ''{{ai|Harsh Lesson}}'' after '''Illaoi''' drops down will command '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' to instantly attack, regardless if they were already attacking. Their old attack will keep on going and will hit while the second attack is on its animation attack.
* Using ''{{ai|Harsh Lesson}}'' an instant before ''Leap of Faith's'' buff finishes will delay the '''''{{as|Tentacle's|buzzword2}}''''' attack.
